00034 #include "batterychargercalibrate.h"
00035 #include <QDebug>
00036 
00037 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 BatteryChargerCalibrate::BatteryChargerCalibrate(AcqSimpleAdcUnit* u,
00048           QWidget* parent) : QDialog(parent)
00049 {
00050     channelUnit = u;
00051 // Create a dummy entry if necessary
00052     if (! channelUnit->isConfigured())
00053     {
00054         bool ok = channelUnit->programInformationBlock(DEFAULT_AD_PRECISION,0,false,0,0);
00055         if (! ok) displayErrorMessage("Could not program device with default channel");
00056     }
00058     BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.setupUi(this);
00059     if (channelUnit->getChannel() == 0)
00060         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.subTitle->setText("Panel Voltage");
00061     else if (channelUnit->getChannel() == 1)
00062         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.subTitle->setText("Battery Voltage");
00063     else if (channelUnit->getChannel() == 2)
00064         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.subTitle->setText("Panel Current");
00065     else if (channelUnit->getChannel() == 3)
00066         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.subTitle->setText("Load Current");
00067     firstEntered = false;
00068 // Blank out the buttons until some entries are made
00069     on_clearEntriesButton_clicked();
00070 }
00071 
00072 BatteryChargerCalibrate::~BatteryChargerCalibrate()
00073 {
00074 }
00075 
00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::on_closeButton_clicked()
00081 {
00082     accept();
00083 }
00084 
00085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::on_firstValueLineEdit_textChanged()
00093 {
00094     bool firstValueOK;
00095     firstValue = BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueLineEdit->text().toFloat(&firstValueOK);
00096     if (firstValueOK)
00097         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueSetButton->setEnabled(true);
00098     else
00099         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueSetButton->setEnabled(false);
00100 }
00101 
00102 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::on_secondValueLineEdit_textChanged()
00110 {
00111     bool firstValueOK;
00112     bool secondValueOK;
00113     secondValue = BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.secondValueLineEdit->text().toFloat(&secondValueOK);
00114     firstValue = BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueLineEdit->text().toFloat(&firstValueOK);
00115     if (secondValueOK && firstValueOK && firstEntered)
00116         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.secondValueSetButton->setEnabled(true);
00117     else
00118         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.secondValueSetButton->setEnabled(false);
00119 }
00120 
00121 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::on_firstValueSetButton_clicked()
00130 {
00131     unsigned char s;
00132     unsigned char stateVariables[100];
00133     unsigned char item = (channelUnit->getChannel() << 1);
00134     bool ok = channelUnit->getUnit()->getStateVariables(0,stateVariables,s);
00135     firstSample = (stateVariables[item+1] << 8) + stateVariables[item];
00136     if (ok)
00137     {
00138         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.secondValueSetButton->setEnabled(true);
00139         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueSetButton->setEnabled(false);
00140         firstEntered = true;
00141     }
00142     if (! ok) displayErrorMessage("Could not read state measurement");
00143 }
00144 
00145 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::on_secondValueSetButton_clicked()
00154 {
00155     unsigned char s;
00156     unsigned char stateVariables[100];
00157     unsigned char item = (channelUnit->getChannel() << 1);
00158     bool ok = channelUnit->getUnit()->getStateVariables(0,stateVariables,s);
00159     secondSample = (stateVariables[item+1] << 8) + stateVariables[item];
00160     if (ok)
00161     {
00162         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueSetButton->setEnabled(false);
00163         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.secondValueSetButton->setEnabled(false);
00164         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.commitButton->setEnabled(true);
00165         float VL = (secondValue*firstSample - firstValue*secondSample)/((float)firstSample - (float)secondSample);
00166         float VHmVL = (firstValue - secondValue)/((float)firstSample - (float)secondSample)*(1 << channelUnit->getAdcPrecision());
00167         qDebug() << "Low" << VL << "High-Low" << VHmVL;
00168         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.maximumLcdNumber->display(VHmVL+VL);
00169         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.minimumLcdNumber->display(VL);
00170         channelUnit->setMulScaleFactor((unsigned int)(VHmVL*655.36));
00171         channelUnit->setOffScaleFactor((unsigned int)(VL*655.36));
00172         BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.commitButton->setEnabled(true);    
00173     }
00174     if (! ok) displayErrorMessage("Could not read state measurement");
00175 }
00176 
00177 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::on_clearEntriesButton_clicked()
00183 {
00184     BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueSetButton->setEnabled(false);
00185     BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.secondValueSetButton->setEnabled(false);
00186     BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.commitButton->setEnabled(false);   
00187     BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.firstValueLineEdit->setText(""); 
00188     BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.secondValueLineEdit->setText(""); 
00189 }
00190 
00191 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00195 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::on_commitButton_clicked()
00196 {
00197     bool ok = channelUnit->programInformationBlock(channelUnit->getAdcPrecision(),
00198                                          0,false,
00199                                          channelUnit->getMulScaleFactor(),
00200                                          channelUnit->getOffScaleFactor());
00201     if (! ok) displayErrorMessage("Could not program device");
00202 }
00203 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00209 void BatteryChargerCalibrate::displayErrorMessage(const QString message)
00210 {
00211      BatteryChargerCalibrateDialogueUi.errorLabel->setText(message);
00212 }
00214 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
